Posts.Content: Jodie74 wrote: Had a core biopsy uned ultasoung guidence on monday 2 local anisthesia and 3 core biopsy and 3 fna samples all at once it was NOT pleasant made me cry and i felt some harsh pain no test results yet,I have had a lumpectomy and core biopsy before never hurt as much as this one in my other breast tests came clear but my boob is swollen and its been 4 days is this normal? The very first fna i had about 6 yrs ago was done without anisthetic exruciating pain i almost fainted had 2 more of those since then in which i wouldnt let them get anywhere near me with the needle unless they numbed me first,had 2 core biopsys also and a lumpectomy in my left breast but those last tests after the very first ones were almost painless ..These tests were done on my right and almost as painful as my first fna and i had 2 locals.. kippajo Log in to post a reply
